replies.msg:
COME ON YOU SPURS






Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
Capacity 62,062
Opened 3 April 2019












https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZtPVnTAh3s










熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會主場為熱刺球場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」



榮譽：


甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984

乙組聯賽 冠軍：1919/1920, 1949/1950
慈善盾 冠軍：1920/1921, 1951/1952, 1961/1962, 1962/1963, 1967/1968 (joint), 1981/1982 (joint), 1991/1992 (joint)
南部聯賽 冠軍：1899/1900
西部聯賽 冠軍： 1903/1904
倫敦超級聯賽 冠軍：1902/1903
南方聯賽C組 冠軍： 1939/1940
南部聯賽 冠軍： 1943/1944, 1944/1945
南區慈善盃 冠軍: 1901/1902, 1904/1905 (joint), 1906/1907
Dewar盾 冠軍：1901/1902, 1933/1934
倫敦挑戰盃 冠軍：1910/1911, 1928/1929Anglo-意大利聯賽盃冠軍 冠軍： 1971/1972

Costa Del Sol 巡迴賽 冠軍：1965, 1966
Nolia 盃 (瑞典) 冠軍: 1977

#thfc Spurs planning to live stream training from around 10am this morning ahead of this afternoon's press conference with Mourinho & Dier, & the flight to Bulgaria. Mourinho taking a strong first-team squad with "no kids" but some stars (inc Lloris) could be left at home.

'NOW IS TIME FOR BALE TO LEAVE REAL'

Former Real Madrid president Ramon Calderon told Sky Sports:

"If it's Tottenham that he wants to go to, I'm sure he'll go there. I don't have a personal knowledge of his intentions or the terms of the deal, but apparently it looks to be Tottenham.

"Sometimes when the salary of the player wanting to leave Real Madrid is very high, we've shared part of that salary but I don't know if that's going to be the case now.

"He came here being the MVP from Tottenham, but now the point is to see if he can recover his time as a good player as it's clear that Zinedine Zidane doesn't count on him. It's the time to end this situation and for me it's the best moment to do that.

"I suppose it will be [a permanent deal]. He has two years left on his contract so if he leaves this season, I feel he would stay at the new club for the rest of his career. He has three or four more years at a good level, so if he goes to Tottenham maybe he will finish his career there.

"I don't know if Dele Alli will be part of the deal, but I don't think Tottenham would want to let him go as he's a very good player. Any big team would want to have him in their side."

Lennon was discovered in a distressed state close to a busy road in Salford in May 2017, after police were alerted by reports of a man in a precarious situation. He was in the final year of his contract with Everton and claimed he had become frustrated at losing his place in the first team, though he did say he had not been enjoying his football for the previous four or five years.
“It was a gradual process,” he said. “I didn’t realise I needed help until it was too late. I would tell my friends and family I was OK, but I really wasn’t. That’s why I think it’s brilliant that people are being put into schools, because people who need help can be difficult to spot, they tend to cover it up well.

“A number 10 for me is an eight-and-a-half when the team loses the ball, and the number 10 is a nine-and-a-half when the team has the ball.

“Who is my perfect number 10? Wesley Sneijder and Deco. Because they could defend, get in the box and finish goals? Yes.”

根據內地傳媒報道，中超球隊北京國安已經同意將中堅金玟哉出售畀意甲勁旅拉素，估計轉會費為1,500萬歐元。原本熱刺已經派人去斟介呢位23歲南韓國腳，但依家被拉素截胡。

據悉，拉素同熱刺出價一樣，但金玟哉比較想加盟拉素，因為有得今屆歐聯，反觀熱刺只能夠踢歐霸盃。

身高1米90嘅金玟哉已經為南韓國家隊上陣30場入3球，喺亞洲球壇早已成名，並有「怪獸」之稱。

由於金玟哉近期獲得唔少歐洲球隊注意，包括波圖、阿仙奴、熱刺、拉素都爭住簽佢，因而被歐洲傳媒稱為「南韓馬古尼」。不過，金玟哉今季中超表現欠佳，被指係無心戀戰，因為佢已經下定決要去歐洲搵食。

北京國安日前亦已經簽入俄超球隊莫斯科戴拿模嘅後衞東尼辛積，代替金玟哉嘅位置。
今晚又要睇愛隊出局

北京國安日前亦已經簽入俄超球隊莫斯科戴拿模嘅後衞東尼辛積，代替金玟哉嘅位置。
